room_modifiers.description: A collection of all room modifiers in the game, defining their properties, effects, and behaviors.

additional_tooltips.description: Additional tooltips to display for this room modifier.

descriptions.description: Localized text describing this room modifier.

disallow_in_deployment.description: Disallows this RoomModifier effect in the deployment phase

param_effects.description: List of card effects applied by this room modifier.

extra_body_tooltips.description: Additional body text for the tooltip.

extra_title_tooltips.description: Additional title text for the tooltip.

id.description: Unique identifier for this room modifier.

name.description: The RoomStateModifierClassName, this should be the name of a class inheriting from RoomStateModifierBase.

param_status_effects.description: List of status effects to apply.

in_play_descriptions.description: Tooltip text to use when the modifier is in play on a character or room.

triggered_vfx.description: Reference to the VFX played when triggered.

use_title_for_card_description.description: Whether to use the title as the card description.

items.description: A room modifier definition that specifies the properties and behaviors of a modifier that can be applied to rooms.
